comment: Sweeter than I expected.  Smells like it’s going to have more a bite than it did.  Will require further research

375ml poured neat into Glencairn at home.  Purchased for 20% off at $30.89.  Batch 29, Bottle 118, bottled 3/15/19.  

Nose has some black pepper, charcoal, smoke, mild clove.  Taste has oak, banana peel, clove, mild spice.  Finish is fairly short and dusty.  Eh.  9/5/19.
Oak, amaretto, vanilla.  Sharp, woody and spicy on the tongue. Start to obsess about butterscotch 20 minutes later.
I tasted Ironclad along with Four Roses small batch and Bulleit bourbon. Of the three I preferred the Ironclad.
